main: ^The name’s Markus. I consider myself to be something of a Braai master.
^Hai man. It’s a barbecue but so much better!
^Oh, yes I see. I am trying to learn more about South African food.  I’d love to master how to make the perfect braai.
^Maybe one day laaitie. If you cook a lot you’re gonna need some high quality meat. I can trade with you if you bring me some lekker ingredients.
^Oh, that sounds great! I will see you around Markus
